educations.degree: Master of Science in Computer Engineering
content: Courses: Machine Learning, Big Data, Deep Learning, MLOps
Courses: Data Structures, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Web Technologies

description: Increased user engagement by 40% by directing the development of a fitness management platform for 10,000+ users, utilizing Angular, TypeScript, and NgRx to deliver features like attendance tracking and workout planning.

Boosted client satisfaction by 45% for 25+ clients by managing a team of 5 developers to deliver an office management solution, employing Angular and PrimeNG to build real-time analytics dashboards and resource management.
Reduced response times by 35% and ensured 99.9% application uptime by collaborating with 10+ engineers to optimize RESTful API integrations across platforms, streamlining data workflows.

Improved mobile usability by 60% by developing adaptive frontend modules for an education management system supporting 30+ institutions, applying Angular and Material UI to design reusable components.

Accelerated page load speed by 50% by architecting and deploying the frontend for a corporate wellness platform adopted by 20+ companies, leveraging Angular, Bootstrap, and modular MVC frameworks for activity tracking and reward systems.

Streamlined frontend performance, slashing initial load time by 40% by standardizing architecture with reusable components and lazy loading while refining API integration workflows using Postman for testing across platforms.
